thread.section_title: DoYouSpain.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre DoYouSpain.com | doyouspain.com | 6 de 515
thread.title: Gerard

author: Gerard
title: Gerard
text:
When searching car for hire I was looking for company where there will not be deposit needed when taking car. (except petrol deposit). I found this one with NO EXCESS from CICAR. After sending email to make sure I understand it in good way ( there is no sentence on web that customer will NOT pay deposit) I did receive email back that only deposit will be petrol. HOPE THIS IS TRUE. I will see on arrival day and then will give further feedback.
Gerard.
